latest_articles.title: Israel Gives Itself More Control Over Occupied West Bank
latest_articles.summary: The security cabinet took actions that make it easier for Jews to buy land in the territory. Critics say the changes violate the Oslo Accords and international law and accelerate attempts to annex the land.
